name: Old Fashioned
method: Muddle sugar and bitters in a rocks glass. Add whiskey and stir with ice. Garnish with an orange peel.

name: Mojito
method: Muddle mint leaves with sugar and lime juice. Add rum, fill the glass with ice, top with soda water. Stir gently.

name: Margarita
method: Shake all ingredients with ice. Strain into a salt-rimmed glass. Garnish with a lime wedge.

name: Cosmopolitan
method: Shake with ice. Strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with a lime twist.
